instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1708 820-00840 Display issue
threads.message:
Hi’ fellows. 
Some sparetime during vaccation I have been  spent some time on replaceing brokken displays on a few A1708 screens. I have a short (Maybe easy one:-); I have several complete displayes which does not show any kind of life, no backlight, no image nothing (and no it is not the LB - was testet:-). I have removed and installed a known good TCON but same dead result. Flex looks okay. Any good ideas out there🤷

threads.title: A1708 820-00840 Display issue
threads.message:
Hi’ 2informaticos.

Check presence of 3V3/5V_S0SW_LCD and DP_INT_HPD. - values are normal. I have found two of my displayes dead… no backlight no image.
Known good display works normal. I think I have some bad displayes😅

threads.title: A1708 820-00840 Display issue
threads.message: This is the reason why we need to always test with "known good".
